3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clear wall thickness and volume. Minor perspective jitter on some external glass panes.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Higher-than-average fidelity. The utility room and WC placement are accurate. The bay window (window seat) is correctly modeled. The stair landing orientation shows slight distortion compared to the plan.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen appliances and bathroom fixtures are correctly localized. Furniture in the living area is added logically though not explicitly detailed in the original 2D plan beyond layout markers.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean aesthetic with clay-style rendering. Some text remnants ('WAC') are visible on 3D surfaces which impacts the professional finish.

detected_errors.description: Text labels from 2D plan ('WAC') baked onto the 3D floor texture.
Stairwell geometry and railing spacing do not perfectly align with the count indicated on the architectural drawing.

summary: A highly faithful 3D conversion that preserves complex internal partitions and the specific bay window geometry with clear structural readability.
